adDetails: Expert piano tuner with 15 years of experience offering piano tuning, piano repairs, appraisals, refinishing, rebuilding, pitch raise, and other piano related services to customers. Piano Tuning · corrects the pitch of each note and "sets" each string to stabilize its pitch. Piano Pitch Raise · necessary prior to tuning if a piano has not been regularly serviced and the pitch has drifted too far to be recovered with a regular tuning. Piano Voicing· manipulates the density and playability of the individual hammers in order to optimize the tonal quality of each note. Voicing is desired on newer pianos as part of a new piano set up or to suit the pianist's preference. Older pianos require voicing to restore tone lost to age and wear. To make an appointment, please email or call show contact info
